mapper.insert: insert into daum_movie( movie_name, movie_name_en, movie_id, rate, genre, movie_opening_date, running_time, overview, img_url, nation ) select #{movieName}, #{movieNameEn}, #{movieId}, #{rate}, #{genre}, #{movieOpeningDate}, #{runningTime}, #{overview}, #{imgUrl}, #{nation} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT movie_name, movie_name_en, movie_id, rate, genre, movie_opening_date, running_time, overview, img_url, nation FROM daum_movie WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} )
mapper.select: select * from daum_movie where movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') OR movie_name_en LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
select * from daum_movie where movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') OR movie_name_en LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') limit #{page}, 30
